humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, 10 lymph nodes were examined and none of them were positive for metastasis (Axillary 0/10). This information aligns with New Rule 11 and Rule 8, which state that N0 indicates no metastatic carcinoma in all assessed lymph nodes. Therefore, the pathologic N stage for this patient's cancer is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that 10 lymph nodes were examined and none of them had metastasis (0/10 positive for metastasis). This means that the cancer has not spread to the lymph nodes, which corresponds to an N0 stage. The absence of extracapsular invasion of the lymph nodes also supports this classification. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N0.
